name: Heng Bunkheang

experience.title: Developer

Built a chatbot with Python and Flask to improve engagement through Messenger.
Designed both frontend and backend systems, ensuring responsive user interfaces and optimized data flow.

description: Explored various security topics (real-world web exploitation, system exploitation, digital forensics, malware analysis, and incident response).
Built a phishing detection system using ML and Total Virus Scan API.
Selected among 14 out of 300 students to join a bootcamp in South Korea.
